Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: face-saving \face-saving\ adj. 1. allowing one to maintain one's dignity or prestige; designed to avoid admitting something embarrassing; as, a face-saving compromise; -- of actions. [WordNet 1.5]
face saving n : an act that avoids a loss of face (of dignity or prestige) [syn: {face saver}]
face-saving adj : maintaining dignity or prestige; "a face-saving compromise"
